news.content:
Today, we’re sharing part two of our ThreeFold Grid Utilization Plan.

It highlights some of our main partnerships, which together can bring many millions of users to the grid.

If you missed part one (TF Grid Solutions), be sure to check it out here.
news.excerpt: Part two (of two) of our ThreeFold Grid utilization plan, focusing on key partnerships.

next.title: Grid V2 to V3 Migration Update
next.excerpt: Since we are now live on TF Grid 3.0, it is important that all farmers who are still on Grid 2.x migrate their farms to the newest mainnet.
